extendedInfo.description: â â â 2013 OFFICIAL DSA preparation materials â â â Includes PCV Theory Test and Hazard Perception Test Preparation Modules â â â From the developer of top rated driving theory test applications on iPhone, Mac and Android â â âThis app is all youâll ever need to pass your UK PCV Theory test! It combines 2 top rated applications in one and lets you prepare for both the theory test and the Hazard Perception part! Simply press the menu button and you will have an option to switch between the two modes (Option Key is usually located to the left from Home Key; it is a physical button situated directly below the display).Main features are:â Regularly updated. 2013 ready! â Complete. Includes ALL Latest Official DSA Revision questions and answers as well as FULL Official DSA Knowledge And Understanding Information for each question. â 10 Full Official DSA Videos With Explanationsâââ ANTI CHEATING MECHANISM âââ Check whether your clicking style has a potential to be judged as inappropriate by DVLAâ Extremely easy to useâ Works offline. Get as much training as you need when you need it. â Select any number of videos for your practice testâ Try your skills in the Mock Test as many times as you wish! â Comprehensive statistics average score and the number of clicks during last attemptâ Hazard Perception test overview â in addition to the official introduction we have compiled some very useful information about the test which will help you to better understand what to do and how to succeed!

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Don\'t bother with the book or DVD, get this!
reviews.author: Edward Judd

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Great app works brilliant on s4
reviews.author: Paul Perkins

reviews.title: Its worth getting the full version
reviews.comment: Really good with the money I just keep practising and it marks and tells me all I need. Great app.
reviews.author: luke clarkson

reviews.title: Unzo
reviews.comment: Quality app taking my test soon and this is very good indeed 20 questions at a time this download is a must
reviews.author: Andy Honey

reviews.title: Take your learning on the go
reviews.comment: Really handy to practice any where at any time. My only grumble is the user interface, it looks a bit too \"iPhoney\" for my liking.Passed my theory test 97% thanks to the app :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pcv theory and hazard perception
reviews.comment: Excellent app passed my test with only this no expensive books that you\'d only use once . Thanks
reviews.author: Steve Burrows

reviews.title: All u need
reviews.comment: Well iv passed my hazard. Using this app and my theory test. All the questions are up to date i scored 97/100 so anyone wanting to get there PCV. This is all u need
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to pass PCV
reviews.comment: I passed my pcv theory test today with 100/100 and i only used this app to prepare. I also passed the hazard perception and i found the bolt on hpt practice useful in that respect. The questions were 100% up to date. I did the test in northern ireland, but i think that is irrelevant as its all the same UK-wide.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hev
reviews.comment: Brilliant app its helped me so much
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good help
reviews.comment: Really useful for practising the test and gives confidence that you know the information.
reviews.author: A Google User
